image_description: A stack of open books piled on top of each other with musical notes floating up from the pages. The books and notes are illustrated in a flat, solid color art style with bold outlines. The books are muted earth tones of brown, green, and red. The musical notes are black with white accents.
image_phrases: stack of books, musical notes, flat color illustration
title: Sonus Texere! Automated Soundtracks for Books
